repositories.deploy: sudo service tochka-dostupa-5-express stop && sudo service tochka-dostupa-5-sails stop && sudo kill $(sudo lsof -t -i:3000); sudo kill $(sudo lsof -t -i:1337); cd /var/www/tochka-dostupa-5 && git pull origin master && cd sails && yarn --ignore-engines && cd /var/www/tochka-dostupa-5/express && yarn --ignore-engines && cd /var/www/tochka-dostupa-5/apps/schedule && yarn --ignore-engines && yarn build && cd /var/www/tochka-dostupa-5/apps/zoom-ticket && yarn --ignore-engines && yarn build && sudo service tochka-dostupa-5-express start && sudo service tochka-dostupa-5-sails start

sudo service tochka-dostupa-4 stop && sudo kill $(sudo lsof -t -i:3003); cd /var/www/tochka-dostupa-4 && git pull origin master && yarn --ignore-engines && yarn build && sudo service tochka-dostupa-4 start
sudo service NET-logo stop && sudo kill $(sudo lsof -t -i:3010); cd /var/www/NET-logo && git pull origin master && cd parcel && yarn --ignore-engines && yarn build && sudo service NET-logo start
